backend/main.mo: Defines types and in-memory maps for courses, images, reviews, contact info, user profiles, and home page content with preview workflow and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a homepage hero text change to its affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including pages, components, constants, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables for the red‑white‑black theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry including favicon, preload, root div, and font imports for Playfair Display.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider with Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Reusable logo component displaying the academy logo image with optional text styling and error fallback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer rendering dynamic contact info, about text, social links, and branding with backend-driven content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, navigation links, and contact button, including responsive mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/HomeGallerySecti: Renders a gallery section that shows skeletons during loading, a placeholder when empty, or a grid of fetched images.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main page layout with header, preview banner, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button wired to Internet Identity authentication with status handling.
frontend/src/components/PreviewBanner.ts: Displays a preview-mode banner for admins with an option to exit preview mode.
frontend/src/constants/brandAssets.ts: Exports the fixed canonical path for the brand logo asset.
frontend/src/constants/missionAssets.ts: Empty placeholder file for mission-related asset constants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreviewMode.ts: Manages preview mode state based on URL params and admin status, with functions to enter or exit preview.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating courses, gallery images, reviews, contact info, and other backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for dark theme and accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing courses, gallery images, contact info, reviews, and home page content with multiple forms and upload handlers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page showing contact details, social links, and an international inquiry form with submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays courses grouped by category with loading skeletons and styled category labels.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a grid of gallery images with fallback skeletons and default images when no data is available.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, highlights, review submission form, dynamic content, and integrated gallery and review data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing current state, features, requests, and configuration for the HR Academy project.
